dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4374 IH: Energy Opportunities for All Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crane (for himself and Mr. Gosar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To nullify Public Land Order No. 7923, withdrawing certain land in San Juan County, New Mexico, from mineral entry.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Energy Opportunities for All Act.

Public Land Order No. 7923 (88 Fed. Reg. 37266, relating to the withdrawal of public lands surrounding Chaco Culture National Historical Park boundary, San Juan County, New Mexico) shall have no force or effect.
